name: 廖文義
objective: 混凝土及其材料，磚石、木材、瀝青、鋼筋等土木工程材料各種性質之試驗方法，儀器之使用及實習。
schedule:
Week 1　　Introduction of Course
Week 2　　Test for Density of Hydraulic Cement
Week 3 　　Test for Normal Consistency of Hydraulic Cement
Tensile Strength Test of Hydraulic Cement Mortar (specimen fabrication)
Week 4 　　Test for Flow of Hydraulic Cement Mortars by Flow Table
Compressive Strength Test of Mortar (specimen fabrication)
Tensile strength test (for 7 days age mortar-specimen)
Week 5 　　Test for Specific Gravity and Absorption of Coarse and Fine
Aggregates
Tensile strength test (for 14 days age mortar-specimen)
Compressive strength test (for 7 days age mortar-specimen)
Week 6 　　Dismissed
Week 7 　　Test for Sieve Analysis of Coarse and Fine Aggregates
Compressive strength test (for 14 days age mortar-specimen)
Week 8 　　Test for Unit Weight and Voids in Aggregate
Tensile strength test (for 28 days age mortar-specimen)
Week 9　　Compressive strength test (for 28 days age mortar-specimen)
Week 10　　Test for Compressive Strength of Cylindrical Concrete Specimen (10x20cm specimens fabrication and Slump Test)
Week 11　　Test for Flexural Strength of Concrete Beam (specimen fabrication)
Compressive Strength Test of Cylindrical Concrete Specimen (7 days age)
Week 12　　Compressive Strength Test of Cylindrical Concrete Specimen (14 days age)
Week 13　　Effect of W/C ratio on the compressive strength
Week 14　　Compressive Strength Test of Cylindrical Concrete Specimen (28 days age)
Week 15　　Flexural Strength Test of Concrete Beam
Week 16　　Permeability Test of Cement Concrete
Week 17　　Tensile Strength Test of Steel Rebar
Week 18 　　Final Discussion
materials:
References:
1. Secification of China National Standard (in Chinese)
2. S. lqbal Ali, 1995 “Civil Engineering Materials and their testing” Alpha Science International Ltd., UK.
